text: Mobridge is a city in the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is in Walworth County, which is in the northern part of the state. It became a city in 1906, and 3,261 people lived there at the 2020 census. == References == == Other websites == *City of Mobridge website Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1906 establishments in the United States Category:1900s establishments in South Dakota
title: Mobridge, South Dakota
